name: The Loopyrinth
description:
The Loopyrinth.

Use the loops to get to the end of each level.

  • W, S - switch between available loops
  • Space - teleport to the next cell in the currently selected loop
  • Click loop checkbox - visualize the loop on the grid

Type into text field - highlight number across all loops; typing “4,6,2” will highlight the numbers 4, 6 and 2

Hold space to teleport continuously. The shoe makes your teleportation go faster.

Ludum Dare October 2020
